required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of SHR-A1921 for Injection in Subjects With Advanced Solid Tumours
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Multi-Center, Open-Label Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Efficacy of SHR-A1921 in Subjects With Advanced Malignant Solid Tumour .

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the safety and tolerability of SHR-A1921 in patients with advanced solid tumours, to determine the dose-limiting toxicity (DLT), maximum tolerated dose (MTD), and/or recommended phase II dose (RP2D) of SHR-A1921

primary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to dose escalation and expansion study completion, appropriately to 1 year
Screening up to study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Incidence and grade of adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v5.0

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to reach maximum concentration (Tmax) of SHR-A1921、total antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to end of treatment, an average of 1 year
Screening up to end of treatment, an average of 1 year

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve from time zero to the time of the last quantifiable time point t (AUC0-t) of SHR-A1921、total antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to end of treatment, an average of 1 year

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve from time 0 extrapolated to infinity (AUC0-t) of SHR-A1921、total antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to end of treatment, an average of 1 year
Screening up to end of treatment, an average of 1 year

secondary_outcome.measure: Total body clearance (CL) of SHR-A1921、total antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to end of treatment, an average of 1 year

secondary_outcome.measure: Volume of distribution at steady state (Vss) of SHR-A1921、total antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to end of treatment, an average of 1 year

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean residence time (MRT) of SHR-A1921、total antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to end of treatment, an average of 1 year

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum steady-state drug concentration during a dosage interval (Css, max) of SHR-A1921、total antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to end of treatment, an average of 1 year

secondary_outcome.measure: Minimum steady-state drug concentration during a dosage interval (Css, min) of SHR-A1921、total antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to end of treatment, an average of 1 year
Screening up to end of treatment, an average of 1 year
Screening up to 90 days after the last dose, an average of 1 year

secondary_outcome.measure: Objective Response Rate (ORR) assessed by site investigator as per RECIST 1.1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to study completion, an average of 1 year

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of Response (DoR) assessed by site investigator as per RECIST 1.1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to study completion, an average of 1 year

secondary_outcome.measure: Disease Control Rate (DCR) assessed by site investigator as per RECIST 1.1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to study completion, an average of 1 year

secondary_outcome.measure: Progression-Free Survival (PFS) assessed by site investigator as per RECIST 1.1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to study completion, an average of 1 year
Screening up to study completion, an average of 1 year

intervention.description: Treatment group: Subjects will receive an intravenous infusion of SHR-A1921 in a dose escalation until confirmed progression, unaccepted toxicity, or any criterion for withdrawal from the study.
